content.removed: You have been removed from the voice channel
content.duplicate: You have been disconnected due to another join
content.default: You have been disconnected from the voice channel
content.deleted: The voice channel has been deleted

permission.cameraBody: We do not have access to your camera. Please enable camera access in your system settings.
permission.microphoneBody: We do not have access to your microphone. Please enable microphone access in your system settings.
